item.description:
Ever want to try kayaking ??? Saturday is looking like a HOT day. Join me on the water. We will paddle up to the park and have lunch and then head over to a nice warm cove and go swimming. I'm not in a rush to get anywhere fast.
Need to rent ? Edgewater rents for Only $5/hr. They have single and double seaters.
Have your own boat ? Bring it along. The only thing Rob asks if you have a boat is a $5 charge for parking ( we get to use his launch area ).

To reserve a boat please call Rob at 540-6520 or leave him a message.

Bring your sunscreen, water and something for lunch.

Come out and enjoy the day o the water :)

More info ?? call me 315-0275 Cindy
item.name: Lets go Kayaking !
